title: Case Update: Emily Noble Part 2
description:
Yesterday, we brought the first part of Emily's update. We shared with you what her friends and loved ones have experienced since she initially disappeared in May 2020. Her husband Matt was arrested in June 2021, 9 months after the discovery of her remains and a prolonged autopsy. If you have not listened to the original episode or the first update, we encourage you to go listen to yesterday's episode, which contains the original story and initial update. Today, we're diving into the investigation into Emily's death, as well as the strange parallels between the details of her death and the passing of Matt's son, Joey, less than a year before Emily vanished.

You can find Jeff's song here: The song is called "Emily"

This episode was sponsored by:

Nutrafol- Go to Nutrafol.com/VANISHED to save $15 off your first order plus free shipping.

Sarah Flint- Get $50 off your first Sarah Flint purchase when you go to sarahflint.com/VANISHED.

Listen ad-free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad-free listening. Available in the Wondery App. https://wondery.app.link/thevanished

If you have a missing loved one that you would like to have featured on the show, please fill out our case submission form: http://www.thevanishedpodcast.com/case-submission/.

Follow The Vanished on social media at:

Facebook

Instagram

Twitter

Patreon
